frame.name: Preference
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> has a greater desire to participate in some <fen>Event</fen>, as against another (contextually recoverable) event which exhibits a specific <fen>Contrast</fen> with the <fen>Event</fen>. Alternatively, the <fen>Experiencer</fen> may have a greater desire that some <fen>Focal_participant</fen> participate in the <fen>Event</fen>. The <fen>Location_of_Event</fen> may also be mentioned.
<ex><fex name="Explanation">Why</fex> do <fex name="Experiencer">women</fex> prefer <fex name="Focal_participant">manly faces</fex>?</ex> <ex><fex name="Experiencer">I</fex> <t>prefer</t> <fex name="Focal_participant">open source programs</fex> <fex name="Contrast">over proprietary ones</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Experiencer">Other customers</fex> <t>prefer</t> <fex name="Event">to send us an order together with a cheque</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Experiencer">I</fex> <t>prefer</t> <fex name="Focal_participant">my tartar sauce</fex> <fex name="Location_of_Event">on fish</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person (or sentient being) who wishes for the <fen>Event</fen> to occur.</def-root>

FE.name: Event
FE.definition: <def-root>The change that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> would like to see.</def-root>

FE.name: Focal_participant
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the entity that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> wishes to be affected by some <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> is the extent of the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s Desiring.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The way in which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> desires something.
</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> shows why the <fen>Experiencer</fen> wants the <fen>Event</fen> to occur. This FE occurs frequently as a PP complement headed by <ment>for</ment>. </def-root>

FE.name: Purpose_of_Event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Purpose_of_Event</fen> is the purpose pertaining to the desired <fen>Event</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_Event
FE.definition: <def-root>The time that the <fen>Event</fen> would ideally occur. </def-root>

FE.name: Location_of_Event
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Location_of_Event</fen> is the place involved in the desired <fen>Event</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>Where the event takes place. Note that this FE is of extremely rare occurrence in this frame. </def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> has desired something. </def-root>

FE.name: Contrast
FE.definition:
<def-root>An alternative <fen>Event</fen> or <fen>Focal_participant</fen> that is less desirable for the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
<ex>I always <t>preferred</t> trackballs <fex name="con">over mouses</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: prefer.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: like (someone or something) better than another or others; tend to choose.

lexUnit.name: disprefer.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to like or tend to choose less.
